name: 2 Surfers
description:
Play with your friend at the same time on the same device!

Tap to change direction and swing the 2 boys,and keep the 2 surfers surfing.

Sick and tired of not being able to play 2 surfers with your friends at the exact same time on the same device?
Then worry no more !

It's very interesting!
Be careful not to hit sticks!

FEATURES:

- Universal build (iPhone,iPod Touch, iPad)
- Two Surfers game
- Facebook sharing
- Scoring system
- Winning and losing system
